item.title: Loki Log based metrics a.k.a logs2metrics
item.description: Loki is a datastore optimized for efficiently holding log data. The efficient indexing of log data distinguishes Loki from other logging systems. Unlike other logging systems, a Loki index is built from labels, leaving the original log message unindexed. The Basic native tool to send data to Loki, is Promtail A sample config file for Loki might seen like the follows: server: http_listen_port: 0 grpc_listen_port: 0 positions: filename: /tmp/positions.yaml clients: - url: https://your.
